content: How can I install BRL-CAD in Mac OS X Catalina? I could not find any working documentation for it.
Hi @An Nguyen Hoang, I haven't done it myself, but perhaps the documentation at doc/README.MACOSX could help?
In general, the process is to checkout the source through SVN, configure through CMake, and then compile. This link might help you as well: http://brlcad.org/wiki/Building_from_SVN
on mac, you'll also need to make sure X11 is installed from https://www.xquartz.org
